Public NotInheritable Class QueryContinueDragEventArgs Inherits RoutedEventArgs
public ref class QueryContinueDragEventArgs sealed : System::Windows::RoutedEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件在拖放操作期间发生，并且允许拖动源确定是否应取消拖放操作。The event occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and allows the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.

summary.span: 获取或设置关联的拖放操作的当前状态。

span.span: Gets or sets the current status of the associated drag-and-drop operation.

value.span: 枚举的成员，指示关联的拖放操作的当前状态。

span.span: A member of the enumeration indicating the current status of the associated drag-and-drop operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下事件将设置属性设置为`Cancel`ESC 键按下时，并设置到`Drop`如果释放鼠标左键、 中间名或右按钮。By default, the event sets the property to `Cancel` if the ESC key is pressed, and sets to `Drop` if the left, middle, or right mouse button is released.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下事件将设置属性设置为`Cancel`如果按下了 ESC 键。By default, the event sets the property to `Cancel` if the ESC key is pressed.

summary.span: 获取一个标志枚举，指示 Shift、Ctrl 和 Alt 键的当前状态以及鼠标按钮的状态。

span.span: Gets a flag enumeration indicating the current state of the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys, as well as the state of the mouse buttons.

value.span: 标志枚举的一个或多个成员。

span.span: One or more members of the flag enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以根据特定键的状态调整拖放操作的效果。The effect of a drag-and-drop operation can be adjusted depending on the state of a particular key. 例如，数据可能是要复制或移动具体取决于是否在拖放操作过程中按 CTRL 或 SHIFT 键。For example, data may either be copied or moved depending on whether the CTRL or SHIFT keys are pressed during the drag-and-drop operation.
